attributes.action: To have Edmund King, President of the AA shackled in the stocks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr King has recently gone on the record, demanding ever draconian measures against motorists, toadying to the government and working against the ethos of the AA as it was originally intended.

The AA used to be seen as the champion of British motorists’ rights, but now it is just another vocal outlet for the government media machine.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
